description.raw:
This is the first of a few changes to the Building Editor's popups.

## Changes: ##

* When there's nothing drawn, leave the editor without any popups

* Changed text on `Exit` popup and buttons

* Changed text on `Discard`'s buttons

* Change button text from `Save As` to `Save` only if the user has really saved

* Properly add the model to the scene on `Exit->Save` (before the temp model would remain)

The new flow should be working like this:

![popups4.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/173121172-popups4.png)

  • Changed text on Exit popup and buttons

  • Changed text on Discard's buttons

  • Change button text from Save As to Save only if the user has really saved

  • Properly add the model to the scene on Exit->Save (before the temp model would remain)

The new flow should be working like this:
